amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike the provision in the bill requiring that U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement maintain a level of not less than 34,000 detention beds through September 30, 2014.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to strike the mandate that funds in US Immigration and Customs Enforcement Salaries and Expenses shall maintain a level of not less than 34,000 detention beds through September 30, 2014.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Deutch amendment (A011) Failed by recorded vote: 190 - 232 (Roll no. 198).
